description:
Usability testing is one of the most important tools in the UX toolbox. It allows you to see how real people interact with your product - whether it’s a website, app, device, or service. In this class, you’ll learn practical strategies for how to run your first usability test and analyze the results.

KEY TAKEAWAYS:

  • Identify when to use usability testing
  • Know the logistics and strategies of usability testing
  • Learn strategies to analyze the results

Learn from Julie Blitzer, an independent User Experience Consultant for digital agencies, startups and technology companies. She helps companies better understand and serve their audiences through design research and a unique interdisciplinary background in politics, business and mathematics.
title: UX Research: Make Better Products with Usability Testing
